title: Retry deployment to production

requirements.text: Retry the deployment of Version 42 to production network after resolving the previous deployment error
acceptanceCriteria: Version 42 successfully deploys to production without errors
Application is accessible on the production URL
All existing functionality (clients, tasks, assignees, todos) works correctly after deployment

constraints: Do not modify any existing code or functionality
Preserve all existing data and state during redeployment
nonGoals: Modifying existing UI or backend logic
